content: a sm repeat until bor decrease round 6 k1 color a k2 color b k2 color a k1 color b ssk color b k4 color a k2tog color b k1 color b k2 color a k2 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 72 sts total plain knitting k1 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k4 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor decrease round 7 k1 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b ssk color a k2tog color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 64 sts total plain knitting k1 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor decrease round 8 k1 color a ssk color b k2 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k2 color a k2tog color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 56 sts total decrease round 9 k1 color a k1 color b ssk color a k2 color b k2 color a k2 color b k2tog color a k1 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 48 sts total decrease round 10 k1 color a k1 color b k1 color a ssk color b k2 color a k2tog color b k1 color a k1 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 40 sts total break color b and leave a long enough tail to weave in the ends now we will only be knitting with color a decrease round 11 k2 ssk k2 k2tog k2 sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 32 sts total decrease round 12 k1 ssk k2 k2tog k1 sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 24 sts total decrease round 13 k1 ssk k2tog k1 sm repeat until bor 8 sts decreased 16 sts total break yarn leaving a long tail using a tapestry needle thread the tail through the remaining 16 stitches 2 times remove stitches from the needle weave in all ends when blocking gently stretch the colorwork section of the crown and pat it flat to encourage your work to relax i d love to see your finished terrace beanie tag me on instagram @oldehoeft charts establishing colorwork pattern crown decrease repeat
